scriptLines:
query: 'Select
     PRF.PROC_ID as PRFRMNC_DIM_UID,
     PRF.PROJECT_ID as PRJCT_ID,
     cast(PRF.REMARKS as varchar(1024)) as PRFRMNC_REM_TXT,
     PRF.CREATED_TS as SRC_CRETD_TMS,
     PRF.CREATED_USERID as SRC_CRETD_USER_ID,
     PRF.UPDATED_TS as SRC_UPDTD_TMS,
     PRF.UPDATED_USERID as SRC_UPDTD_USER_ID,
     JOB.ETL_JOB_ID,
     FIL.ETL_EXCTN_ID,
     SYS.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID,
     case when PDEL.PROC_ID is null then 0 else 1 end as IS_DELETED,
     PRF.ORIG_ORG,
     HashBytes('SHA2_256',
          coalesce(cast(PRF.PROJECT_ID as varchar), '') +
          coalesce(cast(PRF.REMARKS as varchar(1024)), '') +
          coalesce(cast(JOB.ETL_JOB_ID as varchar), '') +
          coalesce(cast(SYS.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID as varchar), '') +
          coalesce(PRF.ORIG_ORG, '') 
     ) as HASHED_VAL
From
     APPFUN.PERFORMANCE PRF
     inner join
     PGMPDM.ZAUX_DATE_TRIGGERS ZDT
     on PRF.PROC_ID = ZDT.PROC_ID
     left join
     PGMPDM.ZAUX_DELD_PROC_ID PDEL
     on PRF.PROC_ID = PDEL.PROC_ID
     left join (
          Select
               coalesce(max(ETL_JOB_ID), -1) as ETL_JOB_ID
          From
               PGMPDM.ZAUX_ETL_JOBS
          Where
               ETL_JOB_NM = 'BALD0340_PRFRMNC_DIM'
     ) JOB
     on 1 = 1
     left join (
          Select
               ETL_EXCTN_ID,
               ETL_PARAM_START_TMS,
               ETL_PARAM_END_TMS
          from
               PGMPDM.ZAUX_ETL_EXCTN
          Where
               IS_CURR_IND = 'Y'
     ) FIL
     on 1 = 1
     left join (
          Select
               coalesce(max(SRC_SYS_DIM_UID), -1) as SRC_SYS_DIM_UID
          From
               PGMPDM.SRC_SYS_DIM
          Where
               SRC_SYS_CD = 'PGMP'
     ) SYS
     on 1 = 1',

query: 'Select
     P.PRFRMNC_DIM_UID as LKP_PRFRMNC_DIM_UID,
     P.PRJCT_ID as LKP_PRJCT_ID,
     P.PRFRMNC_REM_TXT as LKP_PRFRMNC_REM_TXT,
     P.SRC_CRETD_TMS as LKP_SRC_CRETD_TMS,
     P.SRC_CRETD_USER_ID as LKP_SRC_CRETD_USER_ID,
     P.SRC_UPDTD_TMS as LKP_SRC_UPDTD_TMS,
     P.SRC_UPDTD_USER_ID as LKP_SRC_UPDTD_USER_ID,
     P.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID as LKP_SRC_SYS_DIM_UID,
     P.ETL_JOB_ID as LKP_ETL_JOB_ID,
    P.ORIG_ORG as LKP_ORIG_ORG,
     HashBytes('SHA2_256',
          coalesce(cast(PRJCT_ID as varchar), '') +
          coalesce(PRFRMNC_REM_TXT, '') +
          coalesce(cast(ETL_JOB_ID as varchar), '') +
          coalesce(cast(SRC_SYS_DIM_UID as varchar), '') +
          coalesce(ORIG_ORG, '') 
     ) as LKP_HASHED_VAL
From
     PGMPDM.PRFRMNC_DIM P
    inner join
     PGMPDM.ZAUX_DATE_TRIGGERS ZDT
     on P.PRFRMNC_DIM_UID = ZDT.PROC_ID',

mergedData derive(ROW_STATUS = case(PRFRMNC_DIM_UID == toInteger(null()) && LKP_PRFRMNC_DIM_UID != toInteger(null()), 'D', case(PRFRMNC_DIM_UID != toInteger(null()) && LKP_PRFRMNC_DIM_UID == toInteger(null()), 'I', case(HASHED_VAL == LKP_HASHED_VAL, 'L', 'U')))) ~> CDCval
